backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, access control, and blob storage with CRUD operations and state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI layout change to the ChatArea component with related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of all frontend files describing components, hooks, UI behavior, and layout logic.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, global layout, 404 handling, and conditional footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, removing, and searching Giphy avatars with debounced search and async state handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area component with collapsible header, message list, auto‑scroll, reply handling, pinned video, and send message logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom card with media thumbnail handling for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter, including fetching previews and live status info.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media input including uploads, video URLs, and Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with a copyright note and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection, adjusting layout when inside a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component to ensure the app stays anonymous without authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media previews, Twitter embeds, and pin/reply functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with optional media uploads, video/Twitter links, and voice recording support.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that loads, plays, and visualizes audio messages with waveform, progress, and play/pause controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Dfinity Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chatrooms, messages, user data, and reactions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with CSS variables for themes, dark mode, and mobile input adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides compact number formatting utility (k, M, B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Utilities to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy’s API and map results into a unified format.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder module for html2canvas loading logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder module for rendering Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data with caching and deduped in‑flight requests to build lightweight tweet previews.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Provides localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file placeholder for future Twitter thumbnail logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file placeholder for future Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting IDs and building thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom, increments view count, handles loading/error states, and renders the chat area.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays chatroom list with search, category filtering, and creation dialog, handling loading and backend connection states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements for centering collapsed chatroom header content on desktop.
